channel.title: ELP Television
channel.itunes:subtitle: Ashtabula-Area Media
channel.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
channel.itunes:summary: A renegade online television network for the Ashtabula area.
channel.description: A renegade online television network for the Ashtabula area.
channel.itunes:keywords: video on demand, Ashtabula, special services

item.title: Reefer Madness
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Reefer Madness
item.itunes:summary: The classic shlock scare film.
item.description:
The classic shlock scare film.
Show Notes Available at https://coyote.works/2022/ReeferMadness.html.

item.title: REPEAT: Nancy Drew...Reporter
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: REPEAT: Nancy Drew...Reporter
item.itunes:summary: REPEAT... A 1930s era film featuring Bonita Granville as Nancy Drew. No, it is nothing like what is seen on the CW today. Please bear in mind that it is also very much a product of the time when it was produced and may seem quite offensive at points today.
item.description:
REPEAT... A 1930s era film featuring Bonita Granville as Nancy Drew. No, it is nothing like what is seen on the CW today. Please bear in mind that it is also very much a product of the time when it was produced and may seem quite offensive at points today.
Show Notes Available at https://coyote.works/2022/NancyDrew.html.

item.title: The Goat
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: The Goat
item.itunes:summary: Buster Keaton versus a goat. Yes, this is another silent film.
item.description:
Buster Keaton versus a goat. Yes, this is another silent film.
Show Notes Available at https://coyote.works/2022/TheGoat.html.

item.title: Lessons Learned from a Ransomware Attack
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Lessons Learned from a Ransomware Attack
item.itunes:summary: Even though it was news recently with the Ashtabula County Medical Center and the City of Geneva it stands to reason that we can learn from how others handle ransomware attacks and learn from what lessons they learned. This event from the Seattle GNU/Linux Conference in 2021 provides some background for us in that area.
item.description:
Even though it was news recently with the Ashtabula County Medical Center and the City of Geneva it stands to reason that we can learn from how others handle ransomware attacks and learn from what lessons they learned. This event from the Seattle GNU/Linux Conference in 2021 provides some background for us in that area.
Show Notes Available at https://coyote.works/2022/SeaGLRansomwareTalk.html.

item.title: Kicking Off 2022
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Kicking Off 2022
item.itunes:summary: Recorded in an undisclosed location, Mike Kellat of the production staff at Erie Looking Productions introduces the ELP TV video podcast channel to the world. Further local productions are expected to come in 2022.
item.description:
Recorded in an undisclosed location, Mike Kellat of the production staff at Erie Looking Productions introduces the ELP TV video podcast channel to the world. Further local productions are expected to come in 2022.
Show Notes Available at https://coyote.works/2022/22MarkerB.html.

item.title: Suit Up: 50 Years Of Spacewalks
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Suit Up: 50 Years Of Spacewalks
item.itunes:summary: A documentary discussing a half-century of space walks.
item.description:
A documentary discussing a half-century of space walks.

item.title: I'll Be Seeing You
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: I'll Be Seeing You
item.itunes:summary: A soldier suffering from combat fatigue meets a young woman on Christmas furlough from prison and their mutual loneliness blossoms into romance.
item.description:
A soldier suffering from combat fatigue meets a young woman on Christmas furlough from prison and their mutual loneliness blossoms into romance.
Show Notes Available at https://coyote.works/2021/BeSeeingYou.html.

item.title: Phantom of the Opera
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Phantom of the Opera
item.itunes:summary: A silent film version.
item.description:
A silent film version.
Show Notes Available at https://coyote.works/2021/Phantom.html.

item.title: Santa and the Fairy Snow Queen
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Santa and the Fairy Snow Queen
item.itunes:summary: Before today's cookie cutter holiday films from a certain television network named for a greeting card company it seems filmmakers of the past liked to indulge in making what can best be described as nightmare fuel. This short comes from producer Sid Davis who is more well known for quite heavy-handed productions in the educational films realm.
item.description:
Before today's cookie cutter holiday films from a certain television network named for a greeting card company it seems filmmakers of the past liked to indulge in making what can best be described as nightmare fuel. This short comes from producer Sid Davis who is more well known for quite heavy-handed productions in the educational films realm.
Show Notes Available at https://coyote.works/2021/FairySnowQueen.html.

item.title: Rural Holidays
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Rural Holidays
item.itunes:summary: A classic USDA film providing a look at rural life.
item.description:
A classic USDA film providing a look at rural life.
Show Notes Available at https://coyote.works/2021/RuralHolidays.html.

item.title: Rudolph, The Red-Nosed Reindeer
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Rudolph, The Red-Nosed Reindeer
item.itunes:summary: Directed by Max Fleischer for the Jam Handy Organization, we hear a rendering of the story of Rudolph. What could go wrong?
item.description:
Directed by Max Fleischer for the Jam Handy Organization, we hear a rendering of the story of Rudolph. What could go wrong?
Show Notes Available at https://coyote.works/2021/RudolphReindeer.html.

item.title: Son of the Navy
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Son of the Navy
item.itunes:summary: We're going to continue with our Christmas theme. Although not overtly a Christmas film, this feature film gives us an orphan and a sailor building bonds on a cross-country road trip. Is the kid actually the sailor's son? Is something else going on? Watch and see.
item.description:
We're going to continue with our Christmas theme. Although not overtly a Christmas film, this feature film gives us an orphan and a sailor building bonds on a cross-country road trip. Is the kid actually the sailor's son? Is something else going on? Watch and see.
Show Notes Available at https://coyote.works/2021/Son-of-the-Navy.html.

item.title: Santa Claus (Silent Movie From 1925)
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Santa Claus (Silent Movie From 1925)
item.itunes:summary: A monochromatic silent film from 1925 that proudly proclaims that it was filmed in Alaska. What could possibly go wrong?
item.description:
A monochromatic silent film from 1925 that proudly proclaims that it was filmed in Alaska. What could possibly go wrong?
Show Notes Available at https://coyote.works/2021/SilentSanta.html.

item.title: Capitalism
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Capitalism
item.itunes:summary: Coronet Films...gives us a look at what capitalism meant back in the monochromatic days of the 1950s.
item.description:
Coronet Films...gives us a look at what capitalism meant back in the monochromatic days of the 1950s.
Show Notes Available at https://coyote.works/2021/Capitalism.html.

item.title: More Dangerous Than Dynamite
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: More Dangerous Than Dynamite
item.itunes:summary: It was 1941. It was over the top. Yes, it is an educational short talking about the dangers of the misuse of gasoline. This is an unriffed version.
item.description:
It was 1941. It was over the top. Yes, it is an educational short talking about the dangers of the misuse of gasoline. This is an unriffed version.
Show Notes Available at https://coyote.works/2021/Gasoline.html.

item.title: Why Study Industrial Arts?
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Why Study Industrial Arts?
item.itunes:summary: Welcome to December! This is one of the classic shorts riffed by the crew of the Satellite of Love on MST3K. It was specifically riffed as part of Experiment 609 -- The Skydivers. This rendition is not riffed, though.
item.description:
Welcome to December! This is one of the classic shorts riffed by the crew of the Satellite of Love on MST3K. It was specifically riffed as part of Experiment 609 -- The Skydivers. This rendition is not riffed, though.
Show Notes Available at https://coyote.works/2021/Why-Study-Industrial-Arts.html.

item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Safety in Offices
item.itunes:summary: To wrap up November we turn to a wartime short about safety in offices. What could possibly go wrong?
item.description:
To wrap up November we turn to a wartime short about safety in offices. What could possibly go wrong?

item.title: Make Mine Freedom
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Make Mine Freedom
item.itunes:summary: A piece of anti-communist propaganda produced by what was then Harding College in Arkansas. Today it is known as Harding University. The main campus is still in Searcy, Arkansas.
item.description:
A piece of anti-communist propaganda produced by what was then Harding College in Arkansas. Today it is known as Harding University. The main campus is still in Searcy, Arkansas.
Show Notes Available at https://coyote.works/2021/MakeMineFreedom.html.

item.description:

item.title: The Power To Serve
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: The Power To Serve
item.itunes:summary: The people at the Jam Handy Organization produced a film for the Illuminating Company extolling its virtues. The old coal plant in Ashtabula is depicted in this film.
item.description:
The people at the Jam Handy Organization produced a film for the Illuminating Company extolling its virtues. The old coal plant in Ashtabula is depicted in this film.

item.title: Immunization (Second edition)
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Immunization (Second edition)
item.itunes:summary: Dating to 1955, this film from Encyclopaedia Britannica talks about the miracles of vaccines and immunization. Before we had mRNA technology this was how the magic happened.
item.description:
Dating to 1955, this film from Encyclopaedia Britannica talks about the miracles of vaccines and immunization. Before we had mRNA technology this was how the magic happened.
Show Notes Available at https://coyote.works/2021/Vaccination.html.

item.title: Trailer: Radar Men From The Moon
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Trailer: Radar Men From The Moon
item.itunes:summary: This is the trailer to the multi-part serial that aired as part of the first season of Mystery Science Theater 3000. We'll start with this before deciding upon showing the whole thing or not.
item.description:
This is the trailer to the multi-part serial that aired as part of the first season of Mystery Science Theater 3000. We'll start with this before deciding upon showing the whole thing or not.

item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Using the Bank

item.title: Shake Hands With Danger
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Shake Hands With Danger
item.itunes:summary: Marked EXPLICIT due to simulated construction site and workplace accidents and simulated gore. This is a 1970s training film produced for Caterpillar Tractor Company with quite the guitar track showing what not to do on a job site.
item.description:
Marked EXPLICIT due to simulated construction site and workplace accidents and simulated gore. This is a 1970s training film produced for Caterpillar Tractor Company with quite the guitar track showing what not to do on a job site.

item.title: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
item.itunes:summary: For Halloween we have a silent film. Yes, we turn to an early film by Universal that does a send-up of a Jules Verne story. The story originally came out towards the end of the Second Empire in France and the launch of the Third Republic.
item.description:
For Halloween we have a silent film. Yes, we turn to an early film by Universal that does a send-up of a Jules Verne story. The story originally came out towards the end of the Second Empire in France and the launch of the Third Republic.
Show Notes Available at https://coyote.works/2021/Halloween2021.html.

item.title: Nancy Drew...Reporter
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Nancy Drew...Reporter
item.itunes:summary: A 1930s era film featuring Bonita Granville as Nancy Drew. No, it is nothing like what is seen on the CW today. Please bear in mind that it is also very much a product of the time when it was produced and may seem quite offensive at points today.
item.description:
A 1930s era film featuring Bonita Granville as Nancy Drew. No, it is nothing like what is seen on the CW today. Please bear in mind that it is also very much a product of the time when it was produced and may seem quite offensive at points today.

item.title: Connecting To BBS's In 2017 With The WiFi232 Modem
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Connecting To BBS's In 2017 With The WiFi232 Modem

item.title: Rocky Jones, Space Ranger -- Crash of the Moons
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Rocky Jones, Space Ranger -- Crash of the Moons
item.itunes:summary: Switching gears with this pick, we wind up turning to Rocky Jones. This is a glimpse at a future that never was. The concept of a Secretary of Space is kinda nice and perhaps we may end up adopting that some day in our own timeline. This is a 1950s retro romp through the galaxy so prepare for blast off!
item.description:
Switching gears with this pick, we wind up turning to Rocky Jones. This is a glimpse at a future that never was. The concept of a Secretary of Space is kinda nice and perhaps we may end up adopting that some day in our own timeline. This is a 1950s retro romp through the galaxy so prepare for blast off!
Show Notes Available at https://coyote.works/2021/RockyJones.html.
